GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.32 to before v4.14.240
GSD.description:
media: zr364xx: fix memory leak in zr364xx_start_readpipe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.240 by commit b0633051a6cb24186ff04ce1af99c7de18c1987e, it was introduced in version v2.6.32 by commit ccbf035ae5de4c535160fc99f73feb44cc55b534. For more details please see the references link.
